author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons were fatally knocked down in a hit-and-run incident here along Chennai-Bargur national highway on Saturday.

The victims identified as Rajendran (42) and his mother-in-law Meena, both hailing from Vellore were here to distribute invitation to relatives for the wedding of Meena’s son.

The victims were riding from Vellore to Bargur on a two-wheeler, and were crossing Chinna Bargur along the Chennai-Bargur national highway around 10 a.m. when they were knocked by an unidentified vehicle and killed on the spot.

In another incident, a 50-year-old farmer was killed in an accident in Denkanikottai on Friday.

The victim Jayaram Reddy was returning home from Thally on his two-wheeler, when he was knocked down by another two-wheeler from the rear.

Jayaram Reddy was rushed to Hosur Government Hospital.

Later, he was referred to a private hospital in Bengaluru, where he succumbed to head injuries.
title: 3 killed in accidents
